paragraph: Lee Hae-ri (born 14 February 1985) is a South Korean singer and musical theater actress. She debuted as a member of Davichi in 2008. Aside from her group's activities, she has established herself as a musical actress, notably through her participation in the original and Korean versions of stage musicals including Tears of Heaven (2011), Mozart, l'op√©ra rock (2012) and Hero (2014). On April 19, 2017, she debuted as a solo artist with her first extended play, h.
